sentences.en: a numbering system
sentences.cn: 编号系统

sentences.en: A surprising number of customers order the same sandwich every day.
sentences.cn: 每天点同一种三明治的顾客多得惊人。

sentences.en: Add all the numbers together.
sentences.cn: 把所有数字加起来。

sentences.en: All the bills had the same serial number. The cash was counterfeit.
sentences.cn: 所有钞票的序列号都是一样的。这些钱是伪钞。

sentences.en: All the seats in the theatre are numbered.
sentences.cn: 剧场里的所有座位都编了号。

sentences.en: Answer question number 4.
sentences.cn: 回答第4题。

sentences.en: Any number to the power of nought is equal to one.
sentences.cn: 任何数的0次方等于1。

sentences.en: Each check is numbered consecutively.
sentences.cn: 每张支票都是按连续的数字编号。

sentences.en: He was ably assisted by a number of other members.
sentences.cn: 他得到其他一些成员的鼎力相助。

sentences.en: I looked down the hallway to room number nine.
sentences.cn: 我顺着走廊看了一眼9号房。

sentences.en: Mosquitoes without number filled the yard.
sentences.cn: 无数的蚊子充满了院子

sentences.en: my days as director were numbered.
sentences.cn: 我当导演的日子不多了。

sentences.en: My new number is 502-6155.
sentences.cn: 我的新电话号码是502-6155。

sentences.en: Once at Elgin day-trippers visit a number of local sights.
sentences.cn: 一到达埃尔金，一日游的游客就参观了一些当地的风景名胜。

sentences.en: painting by numbers.
sentences.cn: 机械地画画。

sentences.en: performing calisthenics by the numbers.
sentences.cn: 按口令做健美操

sentences.en: She retained a number of copies for further annotation.
sentences.cn: 她保留了许多副本以便作进一步的注解。

sentences.en: Sorry, you have the wrong number.
sentences.cn: 对不起，你拨错号码了。

sentences.en: The band was starting to play a fast, loud number.
sentences.cn: 乐队奏起一首很大声的快歌。

sentences.en: The city has trebled the number of its prisoners to 21,000.
sentences.cn: 该市的囚犯人数增长了两倍，达到21,000人。

sentences.en: The crowd numbered more than a thousand.
sentences.cn: 聚集的人群共计一千多人。

sentences.en: The economy is the number one issue by far.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，经济是头等大事。

sentences.en: the game can involve any number of players.
sentences.cn: 这个游戏可以让任意数量的人参加。

sentences.en: The number of commuters to London has dropped by 100,000.
sentences.cn: 往返于伦敦的上班族减少了10万。

sentences.en: The official number of people carrying the AIDS virus is low.
sentences.cn: 艾滋病病毒携带者的官方数字并不高。

sentences.en: There are an amazing number of commonalities between systems.
sentences.cn: 体制之间有着多得惊人的共性。

sentences.en: There must be any number of people in my position.
sentences.cn: 一定有很多人处在我这种境况。

sentences.en: they forgot the message times without number.
sentences.cn: 他们忘记了那不计其数的信息次数。

sentences.en: They haven’t numbered the pages of the report.
sentences.cn: 他们还未给报告编页码。

sentences.en: They issue a fixed number of shares that trade publicly.
sentences.cn: 他们发行一定数量的可公开交易的股票。

sentences.en: They wrote various numbers on a large sheet of paper.
sentences.cn: 他们在一张大纸上写下了很多不同的数字。

sentences.en: We numbered 20 (= there were 20 of us in the group).
sentences.cn: 我们总共20人。

words.tran_cn: 编号；计入；数…的数目；使为数有限

phrases.tran_cn: （逐条）按照指示机械地；死板地
机械地：以严格的，一步一步的或机械的方式
(北美，非正式)（尤指故意通过欺骗、羞辱、指责）伤害（某人）
彻底地挫败：精心策划和彻底地挫败、使无用或使丢脸
对某人心中有数：确定或了解某人真正的性格或动机
(非正式)了解某人的真实动机（或性格）从而获得优势
(非正式)（炸弹、子弹或其他投射武器）注定要击中某人
(非正式)某人的死期（或劫数）已到
某人/某物时日无多，持续不了多久
adv. 合计数为...；达到...的数目

trans.tran_cn: 数字，编号，号码，数量，一群人，期，号，一段音乐，令人羡慕的东西，（语法）数
trans.tran_en: a word or sign that represents an amount or a quantity
to make a particular number when added together
